Framed Prints

Bring a touch of Hollywood glamour to your home with this beautiful framed print from the Media Storehouse range. Featuring Pierce Brosnan, the iconic actor, in a rare moment of family bliss with his late wife Cassandra Harris and their two charming children, Charlotte and Christopher, in December 1980. Captured by an unknown photographer from Memory Lane Prints, this timeless image is a must-have for any fan or collector. The high-quality print is expertly framed in a classic design, adding an air of sophistication and elegance to any room. Order yours today and relive the magic of Pierce Brosnan's early years with his beloved family.
